News

July 28, 2024 I attended the The Cornell, Maryland, Max Planck Pre-doctoral Research School in Computer Science (CMMRS 2024) at MPI-SWS in Saarsbrucken on a fully-funded scholarship.
April 1, 2024 I was recently awarded the Extraordinary Master’s Award for the best academic record in my degree at the University of the Balearic Islands.
February 28, 2024 I attended the EDISS Winter School as an alumni, where I gave a talk on AI for autonomous load handling systems.
November 29, 2023 I received my diploma from Åbo Akademi upon completion of my master's degree.
October 26, 2023 Our paper titled "Environmental stiffness restores mechanical homeostasis in vimentin-depleted cells" has been published in Scientific Reports. I had the opportunity of working with a great time from TU Eindhoven for this work. The article can be accessed on Nature.
October 19, 2023 I successfully defended my thesis titled "Whole-body manipulation using Reinforcement Learning" at the University of the Balearic Islands. The thesis can be accessed here.
August 01, 2023 I started a new position at Hiab where I would be working as a Robotic Software Developer. Hiab works in automated load handling for multilifts and hooklifts electric trucks. Within this role, I would be a part of developing software for automated driving of trucks.
February 01, 2023 I started working as a Master's Thesis Student Researcher at Nokia Bell Labs, Finland. For the next 6 months, I would be working in exploring RL-based solutions for jointly navigating and manipulating mobile manipulators.
January 20, 2023 Our paper SACPlanner: Real-World Collision Avoidance with a Soft Actor Critic Local Planner and Polar State Representations was accepted to the IEEE international conference on robotics and automation (ICRA) 2023.
October 20, 2022 I presented our paper at OCEANS 2022 Hampton Roads virtually. The recording can be accessed here.
October 10, 2022 Our article on the application of digital twins in the autonomous vessel development has been published in MDPI Journal of Marine Science and Engineering (JMSE). It can be accessed here.
September 11, 2022 I will be attending the University of the Balearic Islands in Spain for the 2nd year of my master's degree. I would specialize in the computer vision and mobile robots track.
August 25, 2022 I spoke to ÅA's instagram regarding my experience in Finland.
August 01, 2022 I got selected amongst the top 20 interns (10%) during the Global Intern Program 2022 at Nokia Bell Labs. I would be presenting my topic in front of the global Bell Labs audience."
May 01, 2022 I have accepted a research internship at Nokia Bell Labs where I would be working on "Dynamic Local Navigation of Ground Robots using Reinforcement Learning."
